data.prayer: Lord, please give the 143 believers in the state of Médenine the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Médenine, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Médenine, Tunisia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary: On average, 95 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Médenine, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Médenine, Tunisia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Médenine, Tunisia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Amazigh, Tataouine people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Médenine, Tunisia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 479,500 people living in Médenine.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Médenine that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

location.name: Médenine
location.cities_list: Az Zāwīyah, Zawiya, Al Ajaylat, Şabrātah, Zarzis
